amendment.description: Amendment requires an annual report to Congress from the President on the strategic nuclear warheads dismantled pursuant to the treaty between the United States and the Russian Federation on Strategic Offensive Reductions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-120 to insert a new section requiring submission of a report concerning strategic nuclear warheads dismantled pursuant to the treaty between the United States and the Russian Federation on strategic offensive reductions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoeffel amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
